SamPy.dates.NumberDate.dayNumber¶

SamPy.dates.NumberDate.dayNumber(day, verbose=True)¶

This simple function converts a given integer to the date of the current year.

Parameters:
  • day (int) – number of the day
  • verbose (boolean) – whether to print or not debug information
Returns:

date
Return type:

python datetime
